body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Storage Facility customer service. My name is Andrew Campbell. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Andrew, my name is Crystal Davis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Crystal. Now, could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is crystal.davis@example.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Crystal. Do you have any specific questions regarding our storage services or facilities?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have two questions. First, do you offer climate-controlled storage units? And second, what are your payment options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, Crystal, we do offer climate-controlled storage units to protect your belongings. As for payment options, we accept credit cards, debit cards, and cash payments.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's great to know. Thank you, Andrew.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Crystal. Thank you for reaching out to us with your questions. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
